MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL61 postcode area of LlanfairPG, affecting properties in Ffordd Angharad and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our engineers on site are carrying out further investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15AM on 12th November 2020
